Reviews.Title: Great cam
Reviews.Author: eli
Reviews.Content: Very good picture quality, awesome video recording, 3D shooting works great also, recommend it. Excellent zooming capacity, best cam in its category

Reviews.Title: Olympus 228046 14 MP Digital Camera with 22 x Optical Zoom - Black
Reviews.Author: Marni A Mallari
Reviews.Content: I thought this was going to be a simple SLR camera but it turns out to be a glorified digital camera with no view finder.

ProductInfo.Features:
14MP, 22x Zoom
22X Wide-Angle Optical Zoom
3D Photos, Hd Movie 720P
Magic Filter Still & Movie
Wi-Fi Compatibility (With Eye-Fi Card)
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus 228046 14 MP Digital Camera with 22 x Optical Zoom - Black
